author: wyoeaglefan
title: Good Game
review: This game is pretty fun, it follows the traditions of te first Star Wars game, minikits, stud collecting, etc .. It follos the stroy well an the cutscenes and levels have little tidbits of humor sewn into the environment(and cutscenes). The only complaints that i have are the fact that you can't skip the cutscenes even if you have already seen them, and the undefeated achievments seem to be a waste of time, especially in the vehicle levels. But all in all the addition of being able to "build" things inside the game and other tweaks makes this game a must have for fans of the first Lego Star Wars game.
